title: OPL Summoner icons
body: I'm not sure if i'm posting in the right section but, is there any possibility that we would be able to get summoner icons for the teams competing in OPL?

replies.body:
Hey Ragged, there's another post about this same thing here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/qmwNGkbA-oce-summoner-icons

Maybe if we make enough noise Rito will hear us > .. <
